name: Eiyuu Densetsu: Sora no Kiseki the 3rd Kai HD Edition
name_original: Eiyuu Densetsu: Sora no Kiseki the 3rd Kai HD Edition
description:
Eiyuu Densetsu: Sora no Kiseki the 3rd Kai HD Edition is a RPG game developed by Falcom. It came out on 27-06-2013. It was published by Falcom. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Eiyuu Densetsu: Sora no Kiseki the 3rd Kai HD Edition on PlayStation 3.
